labels.label:
If the wait processor expires, this indicates 
that for a given source system and country 
the tables that don't need to be detokenised 
were not saved properly to HDP


From here, an acknowledgement of the 
failure will be written to the local file 
system. The flow can be replayed to try 
again from the first processor in this process 
group, or from the first processor of the 
whole flow

Please allow time for 
the bash script to run

Restarts for this section of the flow can be 
triggered from this processor
Data Transfer to Staging for Detokenisation
This needs to be to the staging dir

Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern
Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern.displayName: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

properties.Script Body:
import json
import java.io
from org.apache.commons.io import IOUtils
from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback

class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback):
    def __init__(self, flowfile):
        self.ff = flowfile
        pass
    def process(self, inputStream, outputStream):
        text = IOUtils.toString(inputStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
        string_split = list(set([ "ALTER TABLE {}.{} ADD PARTITION ( {} = '{}' );".format(x.split("/")[-4], x.split("/")[-3], x.split("/")[-2].split("=")[0], x.split("/")[-2].split("=")[1]) for x in text.split("\n") if x ]))
        rejoined = "\n".join(string_split)
        outputStream.write(bytearray(rejoined.encode('utf-8')))

flowFile = session.get()
if (flowFile != None):
    flowFile = session.write(flowFile,PyStreamCallback(flowFile))
    session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

labels.label:
Please allow time for 
the bash script to run
Data Transfer to OnPrem Direct Tables

If the wait processor expires, this indicates 
that for a given source system and country 
the tables that don't need to be detokenised 
were not saved properly to HDP


From here, an acknowledgement of the 
failure will be written to the local file 
system. The flow can be replayed to try 
again from the first processor in this process 
group, or from the first processor of the 
whole flow

Restarts for this section of the flow can be 
triggered from this processor
